long_description: The REI Zip-O-Gauge thermometer keeps tabs on the temperature throughout the day. View the temperature and calculate wind-chill with this tiny zipper-pull thermometer. Fully functional instrument is housed in a clear acrylic case; cushion-mounted for durability. Thermometer displays in both Fahrenheit and Celsius temperatures. Wind-chill chart on back calculates temperature difference. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: The REI Zip-O-Gauge thermometer keeps tabs on the temperature throughout the day. View the temperature and calculate wind-chill with this tiny zipper-pull thermometer.
